name: proposal-temporal
description: Provides standard objects and functions for working with dates and times.

scripts.test: cd polyfill && npm install && npm test && cd ..
scripts.codecov: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run codecov && cd ..
scripts.build:polyfill: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:javascript: npm run build:polyfill && cd docs && npm install && npm run build:javascript && cd .. && cp docs/*.js out/docs/
scripts.build:docs: cd docs && npm install && npm run build:html && cd .. && cp docs/*.html out/docs/
scripts.build: npm run build:javascript && npm run build:docs && npm run build:spec

author: Ujjwal Sharma <usharma@igalia.com>
